dialogue.string: 1�In the Gustaberg Mountains ofSouthern Quon lies the industrialnation known as the Republic of Bastok.
4�Compared to San d'Oria, with its legendaryorders of knights, or Windurst, with itsancient institutes of magic, Bastok is stillbut a newborn nation.
4�But advanced technology and near limitlessunderground resources have allowed Bastokto rival the other two nations in power.
4�Innovative and adaptable Humes make upmore than half the population of Bastok.
4�With their flair for industry, economy,and politics, they were the driving forcebehind Bastok's rapid growth. Even now,Humes hold key positions in those areas.
4�The Galka, a race of hulking humanoids,comprise a third of Bastok's population.Originally hailing from Zepwell, they cameto this land over six hundred years ago.
4�Without their incomparable strength,the countless ore mines that drive Bastok'seconomy would never have been dug.
4�Adventurers seeking fame and fortuneflock to rising nations like Bastok.You are one of them.
4�Your story begins here, amid the smokeand bustle of the industrial city of Bastok.
1�First time in Bastok?Yes.No.
1�What do you want to do?Fight monsters!Go shopping.Find some work.
1�What do you want to do?Serve Bastok.Help people.Get rich, quick.
4�Excuse me...
1�How do I get to the residential area?
1�Uh, hello. I'm new in Bastok.Can you tell me where the residential area is?
1�Oh! I'm sorry, I didn't realize you were new here, too.
1�I guess I'll have to find my way there myself.People aren't too friendly around here, are they?
1�Anyways, good luck to the both of us!
1�Pesky Hume... Where does he think he is, Windurst?Some day this is turning out to be.
1�You're not from around here either, huh? No use denying it... I can smell it.
1�If you don't want to get hurt, turn around and go back where you came from.
1�Oh? Since when do you care what happens to outsiders, Gumbah?
1�Hrmph. Whatever.
1�You just remember, outsider, I won't go so easy on you next time.
1�This is no place for you to be wandering around.Get out of my sight, outsider.
1�What do you think you're looking at?Huh? Deidogolly? What did that old Phara woman say?That nonsense has nothing to do with me.
1�What? You're still here?I don't know anything about any pesky old Hume woman. Raogrimm and Yasin? Yeah, I knew them. Raogrimm and I were the same age, too.
1�Sure, he was the Talekeeper.Sure, when he was reborn the same year as I was, he had two hundred years of knowledge.
1�Of course I hated him.Raogrimm the know-it-all, acting like an elder when he was just a kid... Always adored by everyone...
1�And on top of that, becoming a Musketeer to win the favor of the Humes--how low can you get!?I even heard rumors that he was having relations with one of their females.
1�Yeah, yeah. I heard the story about him taking down some mighty Quadav in the Palborough Mines, but I don't believe it.
1�He was told to bring back a certain item as proof, but you know, he never did.
1�??The beast did not carry one.?? That's what he said, but it's a lie. A lie he told to gain fame. I bet you he never went anywhere near the beast's lair.
1�You seem strong enough. Why don't you go and see if you can take down that Quadav? They say it appears deep in the Palborough Mines in some room where the Quadav keep their eggs.
1�If you can bring back  $????, then it will prove that Raogrimm was a fake!
1�What!?You managed to get  $????!?This proves it! Raogrimm was a liar!
1�??Talekeeper??... Hah! He was nothing but a fake!
1�You!If it isn't Pagdako...I mean, ??Iron Eater.??What, the Humes finally let you off your leash?
1�Yeah...yeah, I have. And why not? Raogrimm lied about killing that Quadav just to gain fame.
1�What does that have to do with anything!?
1�Greaves... You don't mean...
1�I can't... Why would he... There is no way he could go all the way to Oztroja...a-and I've never heard of such an item anyway.
1�I can't... Why would he... There is no way he could go all the way to Oztroja...a-and I've never heard of such an item anyway.
1�? $????!Where did you get this!?
1�So you really do get these from the leeches in Castle Oztroja... He went all the way there to keep his promise...
1�Yes, I do have greaves made of this material. They were sent to me with an unsigned note that only said, ??The greaves I promised.??
1�His promise...It had to be when...
1�It must have been that promise...Why would he remember something stupid like that?Even I didn't remember until now...
1�Anyway, I thank you. Those greaves are old now, but I can repair them with this new #????.
1�My days of battle are over. I would like you to have the greaves. Stop by tomorrow morning to pick them up.
1�I've finished the greaves.These hold the soul of Raogrimm. Use them as he would have.
1�I hate saying this to an outsider like you, but...thanks. And that's all I'm going to say.
1�Hey, remember when Iron Eater showed up here?
1�He was gathering information about Raogrimm. I hear that they are starting up some operation to collect his lost items...
1�And so I got this idea...
1�...Wait. I can't be asking outsiders for help. It's just not like me. Forget what I said!
1�Hey. Isn't this  $?????Where did you get this?
1�...I see Detzo has a big mouth.Yeah, this brings back memories. Raogrimm and I always used to eat these.
1�That's right. You're the one who wanted to hear about the operation to find some of Raogrimm's lost items.
1�Many years ago, Raogrimm was sent as an envoy to San d'Oria. As a gesture of friendship, he offered his armor to the Knights of San d'Oria.
1�But apparently it was recently stolen. To San d'Oria, this is an enormous blunder, and the high-ups in Bastok are determined to get it back first.
1�Bastok wants to use the armor as a bargaining tool with San d'Oria.Unbelievable what outrageous plans those Humes think up...
1�Hey, why don't you try to find it before the Musketeers do? I'd rather an adventurer like you have that armor than seeing it turned into a political tool for those idiots in the government.
1�I heard that the ones who stole Raogrimm's armor are a group of Goblin thieves that keep their hideout in the Behemoth's Dominion.
1�Why are only adventurers allowed in the Korroloka Tunnel!? How long must we Galka live in the confines of that cramped Hume-hole!?
1� 's badge flashes brightly.
1�This is no place for you to be wandering around. You outsiders never listen.
1�I don't know about any of this ??Aht Urhgan?? business, but don't bring your problems to me.
1�Hey, hey! There's no need to be rude.
1�I'm just saying that one such as you shouldn't bother with their like, O Great Warrior Deidogg.
1�Sorry about that.People can be so hard-headed around here sometimes.
1�Hey, why the glum look? Don't like being talked to like some new recruit? But it is your first time here, isn't it?
1�Is there anything you want to know? Anything you want to do?Maybe I can point you in the right direction.
1�Really?Well, you still look like you haven't been around much.
1�Is there anything you want to know? Anything you want to do?Maybe I can point you in the right direction.
1�Then you shouldn't have to come into the city in the first place.
1�Go back the way you came and pass through the South Gate. That'll take you outside.
1�Oh, and make sure to always ??check?? monsters out before fighting them. You don't want to pick fights with things you can't beat.
1�There are some small shops through that arch over there, but...
1�If you want better stuff, you should go to the Markets.
1�Good call. You should start with a short-term goal to get yourself on track.What kind of work are you looking for?
1�You should go talk to a gate guard.Try one of the town gates, like the one you just came through.
1�That's the spirit!Could you do me a favor then, and help a friend of mine?
1�It's the first house down the road through that big arch.
1�Well, if I knew anything about that, I wouldn't be here, would I?
1�Anyway, maybe Echo Hawk can help you. He's got ears all over the place.
1�Take a right and go straight through that entrance. He's usually lurking around there.
1�Oh, and take this. It's  $????.Arva should give you money for it. She's standing around the rear of the general goods store.
1�Here.You can check your map again by selecting ??Map?? from the main menu on the right.
1�If you want to know where Arva is, open the ??Map?? menu, choose ??Markers,?? and press the right arrow key. She should be somewhere in that list.
1�Oh, I'm sure you know this already, but if you want to give items to people in town, use ??Trade?? from the main menu.
1�I guess that's it. I have to run now, but I'm sure we'll meet again!
1�Ah, now I understand...
1�Is that why you don't like talking about the past, then, Babenn?
1�But it's been more than a hundred and fifty years.Don't you think it's time you told your story?
1�You must've figured it out by now, right?Galka in Bastok have two names.
1�One is our given name. The other...a name that Humes give us if they can't pronounce the first one.
1�??Vigilant Owl??...that was what they called you, wasn't it, Babenn?You've told me before...and I haven't forgotten.
1�That was pretty complicated...I really hope he understood.
1�Oh, really? That's weird...Uh...I think Werei told me, yeah.
1�Anyways, I gotta run!Bye!
1�Werei was the oldest Galka around here.He was really strong when he was young, you know.
1�He's the one who taught Iron Eater, the only Galka in the Mythril Musketeers, how to fight.
1�I'm here. What do you want?
1�Oh, not again. Didn't I beat you last time?You've always been such a pestering child...
1�You didn't say I couldn't.Besides, you cheated first. I saw you borrow Deidogg's sword.
1�Oh, please...Fine, I forfeit. You win. Can I go now?
1�You're borrowing again...
1�Uh-huh, good for you. My helm should be here soon.
1�How's this?Do I win?
1�Well, uh... I gotta go!
1�Fine by me! See you!
1�Hi!You know, we also had a visitor before Werei left...
1�Hey, Werei?The Musketeer's back again.
1�So...why are there less dark knights since Zeid disappeared? Any idea?
1�...That's one of the last things I remember Werei saying.Say, why don't you go find Zeid yourself?Maybe he can teach you how to become a dark knight, too.
1�Though Werei once told me that the road to becoming one is not an easy one to take.
1�Hey,  [miss/mister], you met Zeid, didn't you? You know, the dark knight?
1�He wrote you a letter. I think he meant for Werei to give it to you, but since I got it, I had to open it to find out who it was for. Sorry.
1�I think he says he's waiting in a mine somewhere.Are you training to become a dark knight, too? Wow, it must be really hard.
1�Werei...set out on his journey of rebirth.
1�I'm not upset. I knew it had to happen sooner or later.
1�He wasn't feeling that good, but he would always hide it whenever someone would visit.
1�I guess he was just worried about the people he would leave behind.He was always like that.
1�Stop it! All of you!
1�When are you going to wake up and realize what you are doing is foolish!?
1�What is at the end of the Korroloka Tunnel? You already know! Nothing but desert! Do you still wish to believe that that is where we belong?
1�One hundred years ago...I have.
1�When Werei and I were still young, we snuck by the guards...
1�When we got through to the other side of the tunnel, all we saw was a vast desert and some sandy ruins.
1�Is that what you want to call home? Even if you were able to defeat the thousands of Antican warriors, would you really want to live in a place like that?
1�But don't you already know the answer?When did the Talekeeper have to start making the decisions for everyone?
1�Let me ask you! Are you willing to go to battle with the Antica just to divert your anger from the Humes?
1�Let me ask you! Do you really think that our home lies in that wasteland on the other side of this tunnel?
1�Let me ask you! Do we Galka really need a Talekeeper to remember the past?
1�Yes, there will be days when conflict will arise between us and the Humes. The world seen through their eyes is much different than the world seen through ours.
1�However, the same is true for all Galka. We all look at the world in a different way. No one in this world is exactly alike.
1�But there is one thing that can be said, and that is that we are all living together on this planet, Vana'diel. There is nothing that can change that.
1�Of course people are going to have different morals and ideals, but we all must learn to live together. There is only one Vana'diel!
1�The Galka future does not lie out in a desert. Bastok is our home!
1�Raogrimm, Werei, Zeid...they are all gone. However, we no longer need a Talekeeper to remember our past. We can do it ourselves--together.
1�There is no reason for any of you to rely on a kid who had the rotten luck of getting stuck with two hundred years of memories.
1�However, if it will help, I will try to do anything that I can--even if it means keeping two centuries of memories.
1�If that will show you that you don't need a Talekeeper to live happy lives...
1�Ha ha. It's been a while since I talked like an adult. It's pretty draining.
1�Now you can rest in peace...Werei...Raogrimm...
1�This...this is a letter from Werei!You say some adventurer had it?
1�Why would he do this? He could have just talked to me...
1�You knew, Werei! And you didn't say anything...
1�Werei!
1�You can come out now, Cornelia. I know you're hiding there.
1�Do you think I know?
1�I'm sorry... I think I just need to be alone...
1�Hello there, Talekeeper!
1�I'm Gumbah. I just came by to meet the new Talekeeper.
1�Wow. Two hundred years of Galkan memories to carry around. Gee, that must be pretty tough.
1�I heard from my friend Werei that Talekeepers, well, don't...
1�...really get to see many birthdays, if you know what I mean.
1�I don't know if Werei meant that the responsibilities of the title were the reason, or if it was just destiny...
1�Now that I think about it, the former Talekeeper, Raogrimm, also disappeared on a mission to the Northlands.
1�There's no way you would catch me being a Talekeeper. I don't think I could handle it!
1�I don't know. I thought he had potential...
1�Upset? I wasn't upset. But when he said that we didn't need to search for Werei anymore...
1�How dare he say such things about my friend.
1�Everybody still looks a little confused. They don't even know how to talk to me.
1�Well, I don't blame them. The Talekeeper is supposed to be a great, sacred presence. I was probably the last person they'd expect to be the Talekeeper.
1�But that's okay. They can think of me the way they always have--as an annoying little kid.
1�Perfect timing,  ! I just received a letter from Zeid.
1�It says, ??Do not let Werei's technique fade. Grant his blade unto those who are worthy.??

1�Hmmm, I wonder if he means the sword Werei forgot to take with him on his journey...Anyway, you look pretty strong. Would you mind trying this out? If you come across anything strange, bring it back to me, and I'll have a look at it.
1�What's wrong? You didn't go and lose the sword now, did you?
1�Why are you here?No particular reason.I went and lost the sword...I'm tired of this.
1�Perfect timing,  ! I just got another letter from Zeid. He said to give you this if there were any changes in the sword.

1�He also wanted me to tell you this: You will acquire Werei's hidden technique only after you've traveled to the Western Altepa Desert and retrieved the 3????.Hmph. If this is so important, why couldn't he just come here and give it to you himself?
1�You're back already?Well, let's see what you brought back.
1�Wait a minute... This isn't Werei's technique...
1�Oh, I see... That's what Zeid was trying to say.
1�I remember Werei telling me that long ago, the dark knight, Zeid, challenged him to a duel.
1�Zeid was still young and couldn't match the experience of the elder Werei. However, from his defeat, Zeid was able to devise a powerful new technique.
1�It was this head-on collision of these two different styles of battle--no, these two different paths in life--from which this new skill was born.
1�Werei wanted Zeid to realize that it was not only training, but also the crossing of different paths that made a man strong... Even if those paths were never meant to cross again...
1�You know,  . The battles you have fought have probably already taught you some new techniques as well. Use them wisely! Use them wisely!
1�What's this?Haven't seen you around here before.
1�For a newcomer, you're off to a good start... You've come to talk to me.
1�I'm Echo Hawk.I trade in information.
1�Don't bother asking the hard-headed Galka around here--they're too busy contemplating their navels. But not me. I've got info on stuff most people have never even heard of.
1�Don't worry about money. I make it my policy not to take gil from rookies like you.
1�My sources even pay me in special cases, you know.
1�Anyway, I've heard that this old Hume, Wahid, is looking for a rare gem.You can find him at the auction house on the other side of this neighborhood.
1�Apparently, it's supposed to be part of some legend, but I don't deal with that kind of nonsense.Go talk to the bard at the tavern. Fairy tales are his specialty.
1�You can probably find him in the Port District.He's not the type to hang around this kind of seedy neighborhood.
1�Good hunting, then.Come back whenever you need more info.
1�I have nothing for you today.Sometimes, even I run out of information.
1�Big talk for such a little kid! So, what are you saying? You've been there?
1�And why did you go there? Only adventurers are allowed clearance into those remote areas.
1�Yeah, now that you mention it...
1� 's badge flashes brightly.
1�What's this?You want information on the ??Empire of Aht Urhgan???
1�The alchemists from there are really top-notch--even better than the ones here!
1�If you can get your hands on some Near Eastern alchemy products, I bet they'd sell for a nice amount of gil here.
1�I am in charge of assigning missions to Bastokers who wish to serve their country. Are you one of them?
1�Have you come to undertake a mission?Yes, I have.No, maybe later.
1�Good.This is your first time going on a mission, is it not?
1�Your first assignment is not a difficult one.The details are as follows:
1�You must go to the Zeruhn Mines in the western section of the Mines District.Once there, you are to collect a report from the overseer.
1�You can consult the ??Mission?? section of the main menu to review your objectives.Speed and efficiency are your priorities. Dismissed.
1�Then move along.
1�Missions currently available are as follows:

1�Which mission will you undertake?The Zeruhn Report.A Geological Survey.Fetichism.The Crystal Line.Wading Beasts.The Emissary.2-3-1A.2-3-1B.2-3-2A.2-3-2B.The Four Musketeers.To the Forsaken Mines.Jeuno.?_?~?[.Darkness Rising.Xarcabard, Land of Truths.Return of the Talekeeper.The Pirates' Cove.The Final Image.On My Way.The Chains That Bind Us.Enter the Talekeeper.The Salt of the Earth.Where Two Paths Converge.?_?~?[?P?O.?_?~?[?P?P.?_?~?[?P?Q.?_?~?[?P?R.?_?~?[?P?S.?_?~?[?P?T.?_?~?[?P?U.None.
1�The Chief Engineer is conducting new research, and has asked for someone to assist him.He can be found in the Metalworks, to the east of the administrative section.
1�The Chief Engineer's laboratory is on the second floor of the Metalworks.You don't know his name!? And you call yourself a Bastoker!
1�The Chief Engineer's name is Cid. Any Bastoker would know that!Now go and see him. He will give you the details of your mission.
1�The Palborough Mines, once our main source of mythril, have been under beastman control for some time.
1�We want you to hunt these beastmen, the Quadav, and bring back  $????,  $????,  $????, and  $???? as proof of your accomplishments.
1�You must present all four items to me or one of my colleagues in order to complete this mission.
1�Have you heard of a strange structure called the Crag of Dem? It is on the Konschtat Highlands, north of the Gustaberg Mountains.
1�They say that crystals are drained of their power if you take them to a certain section of that structure.
1�Chief Cid is currently investigating this strange phenomenon, and is asking for someone to bring back a faded crystal.
1�Go see him for a more detailed explanation of your objectives.
1�You want a crystal to use for this experiment? Are you not an adventurer? It should be easy for you to procure one.
1�You are to collect  $???? from beasts in the Dangruf Wadi.
1�Senator Alois is in need of some. Do not ask me why.He can be found in the President's Office.
1�You've acquired quite a reputation.There is a new mission for you to tackle.
1�First, speak to Sir Naji of the Mythril Musketeers at the President's Office.This mission is of great import to the welfare of our nation.
1�I see you've made it back safely from your journey to Windurst and San d'Oria.This new mission should not be hard for an experienced adventurer like you.
1�The Mythril Musketeers are planning an offensive on the Quadav stronghold.
1�Adventurers, including yourself, have been asked to join them on this operation.
1�You are to go meet Iron Eater, one of the Mythril Musketeers, to receive a full briefing.
1�The Gusgen Mines in the Konschtat Highlands have been dug to the bare rock and abandoned for some time...
1�But lately, there have been reports that a rare ore can be found in them.No one has claimed this new vein yet.

1�You are to bring back a sample of the ore to confirm these reports. A Galka adventurer named Davyad should be able to help you. He is said to have acquired a chunk of the ore when he was there last.
1�The item that Davyad brought back was  $????. That is what you should seek as well.Once you have the ore, hand them over to me or one of my colleagues.
1�You have heard of Jeuno, have you not? The Bastokan government is currently looking for someone to send there, and your name is on the list of candidates.
1�The presidential aide, Sir Lucius himself, recommended you. It is a great honor--you should be proud!
1�Sir Lucius wishes to see you as soon as possible. Go meet him in his office in the administrative section at the top of the Metalworks.
1�I have orders for you from the president himself.You must have heard already, but he wants you to go to Fei'Yin.
1�Go speak to Sir Naji at the President's Office.He will show you in.
1�So, it has finally come to this... You are to infiltrate the Kindred's main stronghold of Zvahl.
1�The president will brief you himself in his office.Good luck, adventurer!
1�There has been some commotion in the Mines District near Ore Street. People are saying that a new Talekeeper has appeared.
1�It sounds fishy to me, but with the disappearance of their elder, Werei, anything could be possible. And the last thing we want is an uprising by the Galka.
1�Go to Ore Street and talk to Medicine Eagle. He says he was there when the commotion started.
1�I assume an adventurer of your caliber has heard of Norg.
1�Well, the place is a haven for pirates. They even have ties with the Tenshodo. In any case, it's an area that cannot be looked upon lightly.
1�That is why we want you to travel there as an emissary. Report to Sir Naji in the President's Office for details.
1�Currently, Chief Engineer Cid is conducting research on the architecture in Ro'Maeve near the Sanctuary of Zi'Tah. Your next mission is to travel there and assist him.
1�Report to the Chief Engineer in the Metalworks for further details.
1�We are searching for an adventurer holding vital information dealing with a certain national investigation.
1�The president himself has expressed great interest in this case. Proceed to the President's Office for the details of this mission.
1�It looks like Bastok is really going to begin an investigation of the Galka homeland of Altepa.
1�Your role in this investigation will have you traveling to the Quicksand Caves. Get the details of this mission from Iron Eater in the President's Office.
1�As a continuation of Bastok's investigation of Altepa, this time you will be traveling to Zepwell Island.
1�You will be carrying out your part of the investigation in the Kuftal Tunnel, which connects Cape Teriggan to Zepwell Island. Report to Drake Fang in the Zeruhn Mines for details.
1�Senator Alois has asked for your assistance.
1�It is something about an expedition to Vollbow...
1�I just hope he's not asking you to go get lizard eggs again... Wait, you didn't hear me say that.
1�Recently, an adventurer who was sent to investigate the Northlands has been attacked.
1�According to her report, the attacker resembled the dark knight Zeid.
1�The strange thing is that the attacker passed a letter to the adventurer before letting her go. Now, this letter's content is causing quite a commotion in the President's Office.
1�You have been asked to report directly to President Karst for further details.
1�Will you accept this mission?Yes.No.
1�You cannot undertake two missions at the same time.Finish the one you are on now before asking for a new one.
1�I am in charge of assigning missions, but I am only allowed to do so to those whose allegiance is to Bastok.
1�Good, you've brought all four parts of the doll.
1�I am raising your rank to 2 for completing this mission.Congratulations.
1�If you've been to the Palborough Mines, you must know now the serious nature of the threat these beastmen pose to our civilization.
1�As a Bastoker, you are expected to take on more missions and go on conquests to preserve Bastok's brilliant future!

1�Increasing your dexterity (DEX) increases things like your accuracy and critical hit rate.

1�Increasing your intelligence (INT) increases things like the accuracy and damage of your elemental magic spells.
1�Mind (MND) increases things like the potency of healing spells and the accuracy of white magic spells.
1�Charisma (CHR) increases things like the effectiveness of the beastmaster ability ??charm?? and the accuracy of bards' songs.

1�What do you want to know?What is the auction house?How are auctions run?Are there any fees?Are there any limits?How do you check up on merchandise?How do you remove an item?My ??Sales Status?? list is full!Nothing right now.
1�Auction houses can be found in all of Vana'diel's major cities. Here adventurers gather to bid on battle spoils, unwanted items, old armor...almost anything.
1�Adventurers may use any auction house regardless of nationality.
1�The first adventurer to bid at or above the asking price will automatically purchase the product.
1�Once put up for auction, merchandise will remain there for a maximum of thirty weeks Vana'diel time (nine-and-a-half days Earth time).
1�If merchandise does not sell within this time limit, it will be returned to the seller's current residence.
1�Transaction fees are proportional to the amount for which an item is put up on auction. The method of calculating this fee is different for single items and stackable items.
1�A transaction fee is collected when any merchandise is put up for auction. This fee is nonrefundable.
1�The International Auction House Committee, or IAHC, has declared that a maximum of seven items may be put up for auction at one time.
1�However, the IAHC has recently removed the limit to how many items one may purchase.
1�A small amount of time is required before new merchandise appears on our bid list.
1�Once an item appears on your ??Sales Status?? list, it may not immediately appear on the bid list. If you do not see your item on the bid list, try looking again at a later time.
1�If you would like to withdraw an item from an auction, you must travel to the auction house, and select ??Stop Sale?? from the ??Sales Status?? menu.
1�To remove an item from your ??Sales Status?? list, you must visit an auction counter to acknowledge the sale or return of your merchandise.
1�Otherwise, previously sold or returned items will fill up your list and prevent you from selling any more merchandise.
1�At any auction counter, open the ??Sales Status?? menu and acknowledge the transaction to clear it from the list.
1�Press the confirm button to remove any transaction colored yellow (sold) or red (returned).
1�In the past, many have amassed great wealth through the auction house. I hope you find fortune, too!

1�They provide courses on practical chocobo riding and the proper ways to care for a chocobo, as well as working to improve the treatment of chocobos from here to Aht Urhgan.
1�Anyone can join as long as they love chocobos. The VCS will help you with anything you need.
1�Chicks hatch from eggs, grow into young chocobos, and finally mature.
1�They grow much faster than people do. Usually it takes about 1 month (Earth time) before you can ride your chocobo.
1�The chocobo's traits are determined by the way in which you care for your animal. Without proper planning, you won't be able to raise the type of chocobo that you want.
1�But don't worry, because you have us to help! We're all in this together!
1�Ask about which attribute?Strength.Endurance.Discernment.Receptivity.Energy.Affection.Satisfaction.Nothing.

1�??Strength?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's leg power. The more strength a chocobo has, the faster it will be able to run. Rental chocobos have been raised with an emphasis on this attribute.
1�Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as ??Physical attributes.??
1�??Endurance?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's stamina. If your chocobo has high endurance, you will be able to ride it for a long period of time.
1�Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as ??Physical attributes.??
1�??Discernment?? is a must for anyone who wants their chocobo to learn new abilities. You may want to consider raising this attribute if you are interested in digging for treasure.
1�Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as ??Mental attributes.??

1�??Receptivity?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's sensitivity when dealing with others. You can foster receptivity in your chocobo by giving it lots of opportunities to communicate with other chocobos.
1�Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as ??Mental attributes.??

1�??Energy?? is a term used to describe the amount of power the chocobo needs to stay active for the day. If your chocobo has a lot of energy, care plans are more likely to be successful and you can provide more direct care for your chocobo.
1�You can restore your chocobo's energy by feeding it, so remember not to skip out on feeding time after a demanding schedule!
1�??Affection?? is the most important attribute of all. Your care schedule will fall flat if you don't show your chocobo proper affection!
1�You can raise your chocobo's affection by feeding it greens and caring for it on a regular basis.
1�If you really want to raise your chocobo's affection quickly, you can give it  $????, but I can't recommend doing so unless absolutely necessary.
1�??Satisfaction?? is a term used to describe how full or hungry your chocobo is. If your chocobo is full, it will gain a lot of energy before the next day.
1�However, when the chocobo is very hungry, its energy will hardly recover at all and its affection will rapidly decrease.

1�What would you like to ask about?What is a care schedule?Basic care.Resting.Taking a walk.Listening to music.Exercising alone.Exercising in a group.Interacting with children.Interacting with chocobos.Carrying packages.Exhibiting to the public.Delivering messages.Digging for treasure.Acting in a play.Nothing.
1�A care schedule is a series of plans that you set up for your chocobo so that we can take care of it while you are away.
1�How you want us to care for your chocobo each day is completely up to you.
1�You can register up to four plans at once, each for up to 7 days (Earth time).
1�When you come to check on your chocobo, we will give you a report on the results. You should listen closely to the report and use it as reference when deciding on a new schedule.
1�With the basic care plan, we will provide the minimum level of care for your chocobo. This plan is the most stable, and your chocobo will probably not experience any sudden changes.
1�The basic care plan is good for those who don't want their chocobo's traits to change much or are still unsure of what kind of schedule to choose.
1�You can select the basic care plan the moment you start raising your chocobo.
1�The rest plan's name speaks for itself. We will give your chocobo a rest in order to restore its energy and cure any status abnormalities.
1�However, your chocobo will not be able to eat any food you give it during the plan, because it will be in a deep sleep.

1�We can take your chocobo for a walk in town to improve its physical attributes of strength and endurance. However, it will have a negative effect on its mental attributes of discernment and receptivity.
1�Listening to music will improve your chocobo's mental attributes of discernment and receptivity. However, it will have a negative effect on its physical attributes of strength and endurance.
1�Exercising alone will significantly improve your chocobo's strength. On the other hand, its mental attributes will markedly decrease.
1�If the chocobo is strong, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo is weak, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Exercising with chocobos will build your animal's endurance. On the other hand, its mental attributes will decrease.
1�If the chocobo has high endurance, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo's endurance is low, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Interacting with children helps your chocobo become a more discerning creature by interacting with people.
1�However, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes, as no strenuous exercise is involved.
1�If the chocobo has good discernment, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good discernment, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Interacting with other chocobos in the field will improve the chocobo's receptivity by fostering its communication skills.
1�But because the focus is on communication and not exercise, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes.
1�If the chocobo has good receptivity, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good receptivity, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo help deliver packages. Not only will this improve its physical attributes, but you will even receive payment for your services!
1�The downside is that your chocobo's mental attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo, or you might find yourself getting cold treatment.

1�You can choose to exhibit your chocobo to the public, which will allow anyone visiting the chocobo stables to take a look at your animal. Being the center of attention will help improve your chocobo's mental attributes.
1�The downside is that your chocobo's physical attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo afterwards. Also, you will receive payment for this service.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo deliver official messages for the nation. Not only will this improve its strength, but you will even receive payment for your services!
1�However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.
1�You can have your chocobo help out VCS finances by digging for treasure. This will also improve the chocobo's discernment.
1�The VCS will sell the item and use the money for the organization's benefit, but will provide you with payment for your services.
1�However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo act as an extra in a play to improve its receptivity.
1�You will receive payment in accordance with the chocobo's performance. However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.
1�What would you like to ask about?A general explanation.Watching over your chocobo.Telling a story.Scolding.Competing.Taking a walk.Nothing.
1�In addition to setting the chocobo's schedule, you can also care directly for your chocobo whenever you like.
1�Caring for your chocobo will increase its affection for you.
1�On the other hand, a chocobo that receives too much care will lose energy more rapidly when engaging in activities. If you do nothing but care for your chocobo, it will become fatigued.
1�However, not caring enough for your chocobo will have a negative effect on your relationship, so it is important to find a balance.
1�You can watch over your chocobo whenever you like.
1�Your fond gaze can communicate even more than a touch and will not have a very tiring effect on the animal.
1�You can tell the chocobo a story you know. This will foster the animal's sensibilities.
1�I've heard that by listening to the story, the chocobo might even realize it has powers it never noticed before. (I've never seen it happen before, though...)
1�Sometimes your chocobo might start acting spoiled or refuse to do anything but sleep. In such times, you will need to firmly scold it.
1�This will shame the animal and have an effect on its receptivity.
1�Competing against other chocobos will cultivate your animal's ambitious spirit and is highly effective for bored chocobos.
1�You can take your chocobo out for a walk in the field. You will be able to choose more destinations as your chocobo grows.
1�I like to take the chocobo out often, too, but I'm sure it prefers going out with you.
1�Leaving the stables every once in a while allows your chocobo to experience new sights and sounds. Maybe you'll even discover something new together!
1�What would you like to know about?Why feeding is important.Vegetables.Wildgrasses.Carrots.Worms.Medicines.Pastes.Nothing.
1�Chocobos digest feed quickly, so they are often hungry.
1�However, they also restore energy at a rapid pace. If you do not feed your chocobo properly, it will be unable to restore enough energy.
1�The chocobo stables will provide your chocobo with the minimum amount of feed required for the animal to survive, but you need to provide more in order to ensure its healthy growth.
1�At the same time, feeding your chocobo too much can result in a stomachache. Remember to strike a balance with both the variety and quantity of feed you give to your animal!
1�Some types of feed have special effects, so it is important not to neglect your chocobo's diet if you want to raise a good chocobo.
1�There are different methods of acquiring these special types of feed, so be on the lookout for them!
1�Just trade the feed to an advanced chocobo trainer, and they will give it to your chocobo.

1�We believe that the best way to promote interaction between owners is through interaction between chocobos.

1�Kamp Kweh!
